member.name: F:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowColumnExpandProperty
member.summary: The flow group grouping key selector property.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowColumnExpand
member.summary: Gets or sets FlowListView column expand mode. It defines how columns should expand when row current column count is less than defined columns templates count

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowGroupDisplayBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets the flow group display binding.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowGroupShortNameBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets the flow group short name binding.
member.value: The flow group short name binding.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowColumnCount
member.summary: Enables or disables FlowListView auto/manual column count. Auto Column count is calculated basing on View width and FlowColumnMinWidth property

member.name: F:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowColumnMinWidthProperty
member.summary: The flow column default minimum width property.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowColumnMinWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum column width of FlowListView. Currently used only with FlowAutoColumnCount option

member.name: F:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowRowBackgroundColorProperty
member.summary: The flow row background color property.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowRowBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the flow default row background. Default: Transparent
member.value: The color of the flow default row background.

member.name: E:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowItemTapped
member.summary: Occurs when FlowListView item is tapped.

member.name: E:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowItemAppearing
member.summary: Occurs when flow item is appearing.

member.name: E:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowItemDisappearing
member.summary: Occurs when flow item is disappearing.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowUseAbsoluteLayoutInternally
member.summary: Forces FlowListView to use AbsoluteLayout internally When Enabled, auto row height can't be measured automatically, but it can improve performance
member.value: true if flow use absolute layout internally; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowTappedBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the cell when tapped.
member.value: The color of the flow tapped background.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowTappedBackgroundDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color delay of the cell when tapped (miliseconds).

member.summary: Gets or sets FlowListView item tapped command.

member.summary: Gets or sets FlowListView item tapped command.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowItemDisappearingCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets FlowListView item tapped command.

member.name: P:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.FlowColumnTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets FlowListView columns templates. Use instance of FlowColumnSimpleTemplateSelector for simple single view scenarios or implement your own FlowColumnTemplateSelector which can return cell type basing on current cell BindingContext

member.name: M:DLToolkit.Forms.Controls.FlowListView.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resource used by the object.
member.remarks: Call when you are finished using the . The method leaves the in an unusable state. After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying.
